body.p:
Philadelphia, Jany. 3. 1862
No. 243 South 5th Street
His Excellency
Govr Beriah Magoffin
Dear Sir

As my Commission as a Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky in Pennsylvania will expire on the 7th inst. permit me to solicit at Your Excellency's hand, a re-appointment to that office, and to say that if this should have your Excellency's approval, I shall thereby be very greatly obliged. I have the honor to remain

Very Respy & Truly
Your Mo Obedt Sevt
Arthur M. Burton
